articles.author: Henry Foy, James Politi, Lucy Fisher
articles.title: China opposes plans for US to host G20 in 2026 - Financial Times
articles.description: Officials say Beijing unsuccessfully sought to delete reference to America’s presidency from this year’s declaration
articles.content: China challenged the planned US presidency of the G20 in 2026, according to officials briefed on the discussions, in a move that underscores the deep sense of mistrust between Beijing and Washington.… [+3668 chars]
